Package zork

Class ActionHandler

java.lang.Object
zork.ActionHandler
public class ActionHandler extends Object
Class to handle more complex commands like use item with item or feed animal
Version:
25.08.2021
Author:
Patrick Mayer

    • useWith

      public <T extends NonItem> void useWith​(Item item, T nonItem, Game game)
      Method to implement specific constellations of items and Non-Item (and extended classes) to do specific things
      Parameters:
      item - the item which should be used
      nonItem - the Non-Item which should be used
      game - to change data of player and rooms

    • useWith

      public void useWith​(Item item, Item secondItem, Game game)
      Method to implement specific constellations of items and item of the inventory to do specific things
      Parameters:
      item - the item which should be used
      secondItem - the second item which should be used
      game - to change data of player and rooms

    • feedWith

      public void feedWith​(Animal animal, String food, Game game)
      Method feed to feed animals with necessary item and then call method action after fed
      Parameters:
      animal - the animal, which should be fed
      food - Name of the item, which is the food
      game - to change data of player and rooms

    • eat

      public void eat​(String foodName, Player player, boolean isFood)
      Method to eat food as a player
      Parameters:
      foodName - name of the item, which is the food
      player - the current player to get the inventory and other information

    • releaseContainedItems

      private <T extends NonItem> void releaseContainedItems​(String item, T nonItem, Room room)
      Adds all contained items of the NonItem (or extended classes) to the room and removes NonItem from room if state is removable
      Parameters:
      item - The item that is necessary to manipulate the NonItem
      nonItem - The nonItem that will be manipulated
      room - The room where this is happening

    • removeNonItemFromRoom

      private <T extends NonItem> void removeNonItemFromRoom​(T nonItem, Room room)
      Remove NonItem from its list depending on which class it belongs to
      Parameters:
      nonItem - The NonItem that should be removed from room
      room - The room where the nonItem should be removed

    • isFeedableAnimal

      private boolean isFeedableAnimal​(Animal animal, String food)
      help-Method to find out if the player is able to feed an animal with the food
      Parameters:
      animal - the animal, which should be fed
      food - the food, which the player wants to give
      Returns:
      true if the player can feed the animal

    • actionAfterFed

      private void actionAfterFed​(Animal animal, String food, Game game)
      Method with the actions, which will happen after an animal is fed
      Parameters:
      animal - the animal, which is fed
      food - the food the player gave the animal
      game - to change data of player and rooms

    • feedShark

      private void feedShark​(Animal shark, String fish, Game game)
      When shark gets fed, it moves from eastern beach to island (or island to eastern beach) and the way between eastern beach and island is free until player moves to other room
      Parameters:
      shark - The animal, which is fed
      fish - The food the player gave the animal
      game - To change data of player and rooms

    • feedCrocodile

      private void feedCrocodile​(Animal crocodile, String meat, Game game)
      When crocodile gets fed, this direction of both ways (beach/jungle or jungle/beach) is free, it moves to the other beach/jungle connection and blocks the way the other direction, same happens with thorny bush
      Parameters:
      crocodile - The animal, which is fed
      meat - The food the player gave the animal
      game - To change data of player and rooms

    • useMachete

      private <T extends NonItem> void useMachete​(Item machete, T nonItem, Game game)
      Uses Machete with given NonItem
      Parameters:
      machete - Given item
      nonItem - The NonItem with which the machete is to be used
      game - Is given to manipulate game data

    • useMacheteWithThornyBush

      private void useMacheteWithThornyBush​(Item machete, NonItem thornyBush, Game game)
      When the thorny bush gets cut down, this direction of both ways (beach/jungle or jungle/beach) is free, it moves to the other beach/jungle connection and blocks the way the other direction, same happens with the crocodile
      Parameters:
      machete - The item the player is using
      thornyBush - The nonItem the machete is used with
      game - To change data of player and rooms

    • useFishingRodWithFishSwarm

      private void useFishingRodWithFishSwarm​(Item fishingRod, NonItem fishSwarm, Room room)
      The item fish will appear in room and can be taken
      Parameters:
      fishingRod - The item the player is using
      fishSwarm - The nonItem the item is used with
      room - To change data of player and rooms

    • useFluteWithSnake

      private <T extends NonItem> void useFluteWithSnake​(T snake, Game game)
      removes snake and set way to north free
      Parameters:
      snake - the snake which will be removed
      game - the game to manipulate the ways

    • usePickaxeWithCairn

      private <T extends NonItem> void usePickaxeWithCairn​(Item item, T cairn, Game game)
      removes cairn and releases stone in the room + set way to west free
      Parameters:
      item - the pickaxe, which has to be used
      cairn - the NonItem cairn
      game - the game to manipulate the ways

    • healSurvivor

      private void healSurvivor​(Item item, Game game)
      heal the survivor to get a note with the code for the bag
      Parameters:
      item - the healing potion
      game - the game to manipulate the inventory

    • useCauldron

      private void useCauldron​(NonItem cauldron, Item item, Game game)
      use a given item to interact with the cauldron
      Parameters:
      cauldron - the cauldron-nonItem
      item - the item you want to use with the cauldron
      game - the game to manipulate the players inventory

    • trackPawprints

      public void trackPawprints​(NonItem tracks, Game game)
      handler for tracking footprints & spawning animals
      Parameters:
      tracks - track nonitem for the player to follow
      game - the game to manipulate & check free ways

    • useBananaWithApes

      private <T extends NonItem> void useBananaWithApes​(T apes, Game game)
      distract apes and set way to north free
      Parameters:
      apes - the apes will be removed
      game - the game to manipulate the ways

    • useKeyWithDoor

      private <T extends NonItem> void useKeyWithDoor​(Item item, T door, Game game)
      removes cairn and releases stone in the room + set way to west free
      Parameters:
      item - the key, which has to be used
      door - the NonItem door
      game - the game to manipulate the ways
